description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter mobile app, including UI components for featured books, categories, and recommendations, utilizing various custom widgets and services.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget representing the application's home screen, displaying featured books, categories, and recommendations.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the state and logic for HomeScreen, including data initialization, filtering, and rendering.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, including setting up the recommendation service and categories list.

methods.name: _featuredBooks
methods.description: Returns a list of the top popular books for the featured section.

methods.name: _recommendedBooks
methods.description: Returns a list of books filtered by the selected category for the recommendations section.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the widget tree for the home screen, including app bar, sections, and navigation.
